changes.reasoning: Create API endpoint to fetch specific line ranges from files at a given commit. This enables fetching the 'hidden' lines between diff hunks when the user clicks expand.
Add HunkGap type to represent gaps between hunks (with line number ranges) and computeHunkGaps utility function that analyzes ParsedHunk arrays to find where gaps exist between consecutive hunks.

Create ExpandableDiffViewer component that renders diffs with expand buttons between segments. Each segment has independently scrollable left/right panels. Expand buttons span full width and fetch hidden lines on click.
Integrate ExpandableDiffViewer into PRDiffViewer and TrackingVisualizer, replacing DiffViewer usage. Pass required props (owner, repo, commitSha, token) to enable fetching hidden lines.
